title: Our First Ever Private Superyacht: Whitsundays or Sydney Group Charter for up to 6 Overnight Guests
description:
Feel the wind in your hair and the salty sea breeze on your face during this spectacular private superyacht adventure in the world-famous Whitsundays or the glamorous waters of Sydney. Step onboard MV Bruce - a 75-foot Sunseeker Predator reserved just for your group. With overnight capacity for up to six guests and daytime capacity for up to 12 guests, this is the ultimate way to entertain.

Gather your nearest and dearest and spoil yourself on the charter of a lifetime as you glide through Sydney’s dazzling harbour or dive into the Whitsundays' shimmering waters. With a daytime capacity of 12 people onboard, this is a unique way to celebrate a special occasion or treat friends to a day out on the ocean, before enjoying intimate evenings with up to six guests on the vessel overnight. Be in control of your own voyage and decide each day which secluded coves and unmissable spots you wish to visit, then be lulled to sleep by the sound of lapping waves. With endless horizons and breathtaking golden sunsets, this is the true definition of paradise - and an experience you're sure to treasure forever.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Spend one night onboard your private 75-foot Sunseeker Predator superyacht, MV Bruce, in either Sydney or the Whitsundays
- Overnight capacity for up to six guests and daytime capacity for up to 12 guests
- Wake in paradise and enjoy a continental breakfast with daily provisions provided
- Toast your voyage with a bottle of champagne to share on arrival
- Explore your surroundings with four hours of fuel and driving per day
- Enjoy the services of a vessel manager for eight hours daily
- Use of two paddleboards, two bean bags and an inflatable pool
- Roundtrip airport transfers from Sydney or Coast (Proserpine) Airport

**Travelling with kids?** Up to two children (2-11) may stay onboard overnight, sleeping on a blow-up bed each. See the Room Policy for details.

**Longer stay bonus:** Extend your stay in paradise to 3+ nights and enjoy bonus premium water toy use, including your choice of inflatable RIB or Sea Doo two-seater jet ski, or one-time use of both for stays of 4+ nights. See individual packages for details.

**Celebrate with family and friends**: Your package is valid for up to six guests overnight and up to 12 guests during the day. Why not invite friends and family to stay nearby and hop onboard for daytime sailing?
offer_address: Shingley Dr, Airlie Beach QLD 4802, Australia

title: Private Luxury Yacht: Whitsundays, Gold Coast or Sydney Group Charter for up to 6 Overnight Guests
description:
You don’t need to be a billionaire to live the high life at sea. Feel the wind in your hair and the salty sea breeze on your face during this spectacular private luxury yacht adventure in the world-famous Whitsundays, sunlit Gold Coast or glamorous waters of Sydney. Choose from three stunning luxury yachts: step onboard the incredible 75-foot MV Bruce (Gold Coast or Sydney departures), 65-foot G5 (Whitsundays or Gold Coast departures) or 70-foot Alfie II (Whitsundays or Sydney departures). Each immaculate yacht sleeps up to six guests and includes two queen rooms (both with ensuites), plus a twin bunk room. You don’t need to be an expert yachtsman - your package includes the services of a vessel manager/skipper so you can relax in style.

Onboard, you will find full cooking facilities where you can create your own gourmet delights, or choose to dine onshore throughout your adventure. There’ll be no shortage of incredible things to do - from exploring untouched beaches to snorkeling through kaleidoscopic reefs, making use of the included stand-up paddleboards or relaxing in the inflatable pool, be in control of your own voyage and decide each day which secluded coves and unmissable spots you wish to visit. With a daytime capacity of up to 12 guests, you can treat friends to a day out on the ocean or keep your sailing super exclusive - the choice is yours.
offer_address: Shingley Dr, Airlie Beach QLD 4802, Australia
